title: Remove extra space between AuthGate hero image and headline

requirements.text: On the AuthGate landing page hero section, minimize/remove the vertical gap between the selected hero image element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) and the selected main headline element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]) by adjusting spacing styles ONLY on these two selected elements, without changing spacing for any other elements in the hero section (e.g., subheadline, CTA buttons).
acceptanceCriteria: The vertical whitespace between the hero image and the main headline is visibly reduced compared to the current layout.
Only the selected elementsâ€™ spacing-related styles are changed; spacing for the subheadline and CTA button group remains unchanged.
No layout overlap/cropping occurs at common responsive breakpoints (mobile and desktop).

constraints:
Apply spacing changes ONLY to the two selected elements identified by the provided XPaths (the hero and the main

).
Do not modify read-only paths listed in frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the AuthGate hero section content, typography, or CTA behavior.
Do not change spacing between any other hero section elements besides the selected image and headline.
